parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.51

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Camera Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets camera shake default params, the default camshake when, for example, you freelook at your character shooting a 12.7mm sniper rifle or firing tank cannon. Would also work in 1st person.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''setCamShakeDefParams''' [power, duration, frequency, minSpeed, minMass, caliberCoefHit, vehicleCoef]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> power: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> duration: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> frequency: [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> minSpeed: [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> minMass: [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name>p6</name>=<value> caliberCoefHit: [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name>p7</name>=<value> vehicleCoef: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[setCamShakeDefParams]] [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, .5, .5];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[setCamShakeDefParams]] [100, 10, 10, 4, 5, 1, 1];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[enableCamShake]], [[addCamShake]], [[setCamShakeParams]], [[resetCamShake]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
